-- | Turn WAI applications into standalone GUIs using QtWebkit.
--   
--   Runs any WAI application using the simpleserver handler and then pops
--   up a Webkit browser to view it.
@package wai-handler-webkit
@version 1.3.0

module Network.Wai.Handler.Webkit
run :: String -> Application -> IO ()
